channel.title: Basic debuging needed :)

item.title: Basic debuging needed :)
item.dc:creator: @Nashi Nashi
item.description:
@Nashi wrote:

MoveMouseSmooth(x, y: 1,3);
if (IsUpText(‘bone’)) then
mouse(x, y, 1, 1, true);
end;

Should use MMouse, Also, It’s “x, y: 1, 3)” Why is there a colon, Also, Those are the parameters of MMouse

Oh and you forgot an end;

Read full topic

well what error did it give you? And i suggest moving ure end; up right below the text. And {.include srl/srl.scar} should go under your program name just incase

item.title: Basic debuging needed :)
item.dc:creator: @Haxor62 Haxor62
item.description:
@Haxor62 wrote:

whats wrong with this (I know a lot…) and how can I fix it

[code]Procedure LoadBitmaps;
begin

Bone := BitmapFromString2(False, ‘aE351F78DA5D8D5B0EC520’ +
‘0844B7449541FAC9A3EE7F498536B9B9A91FE389830722A26B559’ +
‘01D15425C0995661DCD88E6637CDAA1FC6BB19FF91EA1C557B3A3’ +
‘F931BF9E85FD6929DB70CCFE5BF77FA6E6C8E1E9D3674420382D9’ +
‘1703236F6696A1AA83EC38363D6222C28AD3EBA48B6D1891322D8’ +
‘CFDE72BE364981E07DB901A00’);

end;

Procedure CollectBones;
begin

if FindBitmapToleranceIn(Bone, x, y, X1, Y1, X2, Y2, 50) then
begin
MoveMouseSmooth(x, y: 1,3);
if (IsUpText(‘bone’)) then
mouse(x, y, 1, 1, true);
end;[/code]

Read full topic
